stepDefinitionsList.name: Update a Salesforce Object
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /update the salesforce (?<objName>[a-zA-Z0-9]+) object identified by id (?<identifier>[^s]+)/

expectedFieldsList.description: where keys represent object field names as represented in the SFDC API

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check a field on a Salesforce Account
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<field>[a-zA-Z0-9_]+) field on salesforce account with (?<idField>[a-zA-Z0-9_]+) (?<identifier>.+) should (?<operator>be set|not be set|be less than|be greater than|be one of|be|contain|not be one of|not be|not contain) ?(?<expectedValue>.+)?/

expectedFieldsList.description: The field used to search/identify the account
The value of the id field to use when searching
The name of the field to check
Check Logic (be, not be, contain, not contain, be greater than, be less than, be set, not be set, be one of, or not be one of)
The expected value of the field

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check a field on a Salesforce Campaign Member
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the salesforce lead (?<email>.+) should have campaign member (?<field>[a-z0-9_]+) (?<operator>set to one of|set to|set|not set to one of|not set to|not set|containing|not containing|less than|greater than) ?(?<expectedValue>.+)? on campaign (?<campaignId>.+)/

expectedFieldsList.description: Check Logic (set to, not set to, containing, not containing, greater than, less than, set, not set, set to one of, or not set to one of)

guaranteedFieldsList.description: Campaign Member's Lead or Contact Id

extras.label: Salesforce
extras.lpDescription: Test your Salesforce Workflow and Process Builder automation as rigorously as you test your Apex code.
extras.name: automatoninc/salesforce

useCases.title: Salesforce Alert QA
useCases.description: Make sure Account owners receive alerts for high priority cases.
useCases.steps:
- step: Given I create a Salesforce Case object with...
  data:
    SuppliedName: High Priority Case (Test)
    Priority: High
    AccountId: '{{Fixtures.Accounts.PlatinumSLA.Id}}'
- step: Then there should be 1 email in mailgun for {{Fixtures.Users.PlatinumSLA.Email}}
  failAfter: 60
- step: And the subject of the 1st mailgun email for {{Fixtures.Users.PlatinumSLA.EmailAddress}} should contain High Priority Case Alert

useCases.title: Salesforce Lead Sync QA
useCases.description: Make sure lead updates are synced back to marketing automation.
useCases.steps:
- step: Given I create a Salesforce Lead with...
  data:
    Email: '{{Test.Email}}'
    FirstName: '{{Test.GivenName}}'
    LastName: '{{Test.FamilyName}}'
    Company: '{{Test.Company}}'
- waitFor: 60
  step: Then the Status__c field on Marketo Lead {{Test.Email}} should be Open - Not Contacted
- step: And when I update the Salesforce Lead object identified by Id {{salesforce.lead.Id}} with...
  data:
    Status: Working - Contacted
- waitFor: 60
  step: Then the Status__c field on Marketo Lead {{Test.Email}} should be Working - Contacted
